txt.en: A good place to challenge opposers can be found at Fushaum Bal South.\n\nYou should challenge those that would oppose the Khundolar.
The encampment of Fushaum Bal is a lawless home to evil men once under the command of Sauron.
This is a good place to challenge those who oppose Khirgi
The Khundolar Commander can be found at Fushaum Bal North.\n\nYou should talk to the Khundolar Commander.
Hold your ground and defeat the rowdy Haradrim
You have successfully held your ground
<rgb=#FF0000>Do not flee from where you stand</rgb>
You have backed down from your challenge!
'As I expected, many still oppose me across the bridge. Very well then. We shall continue working toward their demise.'
'It is time to challenge those who oppose me! Proclaim my rule over Fushaum Bal across the bridge and fight those who disobey!\n\n'You shall be rewarded, if you return alive!'
A group of angered and rowdy Haradrim approach!
